name: Building for Minecraft
description:
Learn to build in Minecraft with these exciting building ideas. If you are a Minecraft building expert this app is probably not for you but if you're learning to build then this app will help you learn how to build exciting houses and buildings. Includes training videos plus 62 page booklet on modern home designs.

> Learn how to build a nice but simple one room house
> Build a pier over the water
> Learn how to build skyscrapers
> Modern home designs

Includes training videos not found anywhere else to teach you Minecraft.

This guide is unofficial and is not associated with or endorsed by Mojang AB. This application is for educational purposes only and does not include the Minecraft Game in the app, Minecraft must be downloaded separately. Internet connection required to download mod and forge.
